string.text: Sometimes, to move forward - you have to start over... My new beginning was waking up in this place. I felt that I was no longer the person I used to be, as for the first time in years, conscience and compassion for others awakened inside me. I am a mercenary known as "Beast" and this is my story.

Makobes was a piece of work, we never got along, but the real "fun" began after Jackal tipped the scales in my favor and appointed me as the leader of a small group of mercenaries instead of Makobes. On the same day, we headed to the Cordon on Jackal's personal order, and Makobes quietly began to prepare a plan of revenge against me.

Vector used to be the leader of a group of mercenaries, but then he refused to carry out a personal order from Jackal and without hesitation, he put a price on Vector's head. Of course, Vector had to go into hiding. It took me several months to find Vector, but at the most critical moment, while chasing him, I fell into the "Spatial Anomaly." Well, it's time to return to reality and tell you what happened when Makobes and I met in the "Bubble."
So here we are, leaving the anomaly, but the surprises didn't end there...
Put the key on the nightstand ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Can't open the door, the Van will see everything
You can't sleep on this bed! You need to rent it from the bartender first.
PA - Arrival at the Rookie Village
PA - Defended North Hamlet from the Attack
